entry.title: Codename: FALL (Premium Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek))
entry.summary: Flip: Choose a word. If that word appears in the names of at least 2 cards in players' tableaus, gain 25 RP.
entry.content:
Codename: FALL

Source Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek)
Set Karte des Jahres
Cost $5
Card Type Premium
Quantity
Star Rating 3⭐
Element Air
Type Citizen
Flip: Choose a word. If that word appears in the names of at least 2 cards in players' tableaus, gain 25 RP.
Source Symbol -
References Codenames.
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2018
Count 1

entry.title: Dice Mechanic (Premium Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek))
entry.summary: Score: Roll 3 six-sided dice. Gain RP equal to two times their combined value. If there are no dice in the room, gain 22 RP instead.
entry.content:
Dice Mechanic

Source Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek)
Set Karte des Jahres
Cost $5
Card Type Premium
Quantity
Star Rating 5⭐
Element Earth
Type Citizen
Score: Roll 3 six-sided dice. Gain RP equal to two times their combined value. If there are no dice in the room, gain 22 RP instead.
Source Symbol -
References

Copyright 2018

entry.title: Eeuroe, the Kingmaker (Master Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek))
entry.summary: Play: If you have at least 45 RP of face-up cards in your tableau, gain the Eeuroe, the Kingmaker Friendship cad. Then, return Eeuroe, the Kingmaker to the box.
entry.content:
Eeuroe, the Kingmaker

Source Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek)
Set Millennium Masters
Cost $6
Card Type Master
Quantity
Star Rating 9⭐
Element Water
Type Myth
Play: If you have at least 45 RP of face-up cards in your tableau, gain the Eeuroe, the Kingmaker Friendship cad. Then, return Eeuroe, the Kingmaker to the box.
Source Symbol -
References Euro-game reference. Catan, symbols on tiles. Millennium Blades, duck on tile. Ticket to Ride, tracks on robe?
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2018
Count 1

entry.title: Fishy Boat: Legacy (Master Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek))
entry.summary: Play: Draw one pair of sunglasses on a fish in this card's illustration box. For each pair of sunglasses drawn on this card, gain 2 RP. If there are no more fish without sunglasses after this, destroy this card.
entry.content:
Fishy Boat: Legacy

Source Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek)
Set Bro'Kin's Best
Cost $6
Card Type Master
Quantity
Star Rating 9⭐
Element Water
Type Animal
Play: Draw one pair of sunglasses on a fish in this card's illustration box. For each pair of sunglasses drawn on this card, gain 2 RP. If there are no more fish without sunglasses after this, destroy this card.
Source Symbol -
References "Legacy" board game mechanics.
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2018
Count 1

entry.title: Manhattan Clock (Master Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek))
entry.summary: ACCESSORY | Action: Reveal the top two cards of the Store. If their total STAR adds up to exactly 10, remove this and all cards in players' hands from the game. Players then draw cards from the Store up to the amount they had.
entry.content:

Source Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek)
Set Bro'Kin's Best

Source Symbol -

entry.title: Ultimate Ware Wolf (Master Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek))
entry.summary: Play: Place a face-up Accessory in any player's tableau into the Aftermarket. That player gains Dollars equal to the STAR of that card. You gain RP equal to twice the STAR of that card. This effect cannot be reacted to.
entry.content:
Ultimate Ware Wolf

Source Mini Expansion BGG (BoardGameGeek)
Set Bro'Kin's Best
Cost $6
Card Type Master
Quantity
Star Rating 7⭐
Element Dark
Type Animal
Play: Place a face-up Accessory in any player's tableau into the Aftermarket. That player gains Dollars equal to the STAR of that card. You gain RP equal to twice the STAR of that card. This effect cannot be reacted to.
Source Symbol -
References One Night: Ultimate Werewolf pun. Doritos. Game cheating references. Trench coat shady merchant.
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2018
Count 1
